tool_description: AI-based Language Code Converter API is an efficient tool that uses artificial intelligence to instantly convert programming code between different languages, simplifying the process for developers.
name: Code Converter
title: Code Converter

api_list.name: Code Converter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://code-converter.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "code-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
